Translations.Text: namumayi kantumuttan agrahikkattavar parannu: "namukk malakkukal irakkappetattatent? allenkil nam'mute nathane nam neril kanattatent?” avar svayam peannaccam natikkukayum katuttadhikkaram kattukayum ceytirikkunnu
malakkukale avar kanundinam. ann kurravalikalkk subhavarttayeannumilla. avarinnane parayum: "kakkane; tatukkane!”
appeal avar pravartticcirunna karmannalute nere nam tiriyum. annane namavaye citariya peatipatalannalakkum
svargavakasikal nalla vasasthalavum uttamamaya visramakendravum ullavarayirikkum
akasam peattippilarnn meghapatalam purattuvarikayum malakkukale kuttankuttamayi irakkukayum ceyyunna divasam
ann yathartha adhipatyam paramakarunikanaya allahuvinayirikkum. satyanisedhikalkkanenkil at ere klesakaramaya dinamayirikkum
akramiyaya manusyan khedattal kai katikkunna dinamanat. ann ayal parayum: "ha kastam! nan daivadutaneateappam addehattinre margamavalambiccirunnenkil etra nannayene
enikk udbeadhanam vannettiyasesam avanenne atilninn terriccukalannallea. pisac manusyane sambandhiccitattealam keatiya vancakan tanne.”
daivadutan ann parayum: "natha, enre janam i khur'ane tirttum nirakariccu.”
avvidham ella pravacakanmarkkum kurravalikalaya cila satrukkale nam untakkiyirikkunnu. valikattiyayum sahayiyayum ninre nathan tanne mati

satyanisedhikal ceadikkunnu: "iyalkk i khur'an muluvanum onnicc oresamayam irakkikkeatukkattatent?” ennal at innanettanneyan ventat. ninre hrdayatte urappiccunirttananit. namit itavitt itavitt palatavanayayi otikkelppikkunnu
